org.dgfoundation.amp.newreports.pagination

Class PaginatedReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.newreports.pagination.PaginatedReport

  • public class PaginatedReport
extends java.lang.Object
    this class indexes a ReportArea so that it can answer pagination requests extremely fastly
